text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya marayamara putra icha'i kaichila, he bani icharaa'ila! ‘Niscaya ma'i tomalokara prati praeraita allahara raachula arau mora purbararti ta'oraatara satyayanakarai arau ejana raachulara susambadadata, yijana mora pichata ahiba, yara nama ahamada’. Tara pichata te'om yetiya suspasta nidarsanasamuha lai agamana karaile, tetiya sihamte ka’le, ‘eya spasta yadu’
